name: MANDALA
detail: Mandala was raised by Nyi Nara Sati, the Queen of White Crocodile Demon. He later escaped and was trained by his uncle, Batara, the infamous One-Armed Warrior. Mandala became a great warrior himself; respected and feared by others.
